name: ALPHA_IMPLICIT
comment: Implicit learning rate Hotkey knowledge gained (Menu Strategy)

name: ALPHA_EXPLICIT_DIFF
comment: Explicit learning rate = ALPAHA_IMPLICIT + ALPHA_EXPLICIT_DIFF (Learning Strategy)

name: HORIZON
comment: Depth of thinking, i.e. how many trial do I see in advance

name: DECAY
comment: Decay factor, i.e. how users quickly forget.
